peril.views.slick.util

Class Region

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.util.Region

  • public final class Region
extends java.lang.Object
    This denotes the region of pixels given on screen where each pixel is given a boolean value based on a predetermined set of conditions. The way that this object is constructed defines these conditions. When isValid(Point) is called the boolean returned will be based on the pixels validity defined upon Region construction.

    The Reducer takes the Region defined by the Image and reduces the size of the Region so that there is the minimum memory over head.
    Since:
    2018-02-18
    Version:
    1.01.02
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Image, Reducer

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Region(boolean[] object, int width, int height)
      Constructs a combined Region where the valid pixel value is true as the specified boolean[] is already 'not reduced' region.
      Region(org.newdawn.slick.Image image)
      Constructs a new Region using an Image where the valid pixel value is any value except transparent.
      Region(org.newdawn.slick.Image image, org.newdawn.slick.Color colour)
      Constructs a new Region using an Image where the valid pixel value is the specified Color.
      Region(int width, int height, Point position)
      Constructs a new Region that is a rectangle where the whole region is the valid value by definition.

      • Region

        public Region(boolean[] object,
              int width,
              int height)
        Constructs a combined Region where the valid pixel value is true as the specified boolean[] is already 'not reduced' region.
        Parameters:
        object - The boolean[] where if a pixel from the specified Image is valid then it is assigned true, otherwise it is false.
        width - This width of the image this Region is a part of.
        height - This height of the image this Region is a part of.

        height - The int height of the rectangular Region.
        position - The Point position of the Region.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(Point point)
        Retrieves whether or not the specified Point is inside this Region and if it is then whether the pixel at that position has a valid value based on the conditions that were defined when the Region was constructed.
        Parameters:
        point - The Point to be validated.
        Returns:
        The validity of the specified Point position.

      • getObject

        public boolean[] getObject()
        Retrieves the boolean[] where if a pixel from the specified Image is valid then it is assigned true, otherwise it is false. The valid value for a pixel is determined by how the Region is constructed.
        Returns:
        boolean[]

      • convert

        public org.newdawn.slick.Image convert(org.newdawn.slick.Color color)
        Converts this Region into a Image where all the valid pixels in the Region are set to the specified Color at the DEFAULT_TRANSPARENCY.
        Parameters:
        color - The Color of the Region in the Image.
        Returns:
        The Image equivalent of the Region.

      • convert

        public org.newdawn.slick.Image convert(org.newdawn.slick.Color color,
                                       int transparency)
        Converts this Region into a Image where all the valid pixels in the Region are set to the specified Color at the specified transparency.
        Parameters:
        color - The Color of the Region in the Image.
        transparency - The transparency of the Color for each valid pixel in the Region.
        Returns:
        The Image equivalent of the Region.
